articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Uganda police detain Bobi Wine, foil meeting with supporters
articles.description: Ugandan police have detained the singer and political activist known as Bobi Wine
articles.content:
KAMPALA, Uganda -- 
Ugandan police have detained the singer and political activist known as Bobi Wine, who planned Monday to hold his first public meeting with supporters as a presidential aspirant.
Police fired tear gas as they dispersed the crowd outside … [+828 chars]

articles.author: TOM ODULA Associated Press
articles.title: Kenya police: 3 arrested trying to enter British Army camp
articles.description: Kenyan police say they have arrested three men who tried to force their way into a British Army training camp
articles.content:
NAIROBI, Kenya -- 
Kenyan police say they have arrested three men who tried to force their way into a British Army training camp on the same day that al-Shabab extremists attacked a military base and killed three U.S. military personnel.
The internal police… [+761 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Over 1,000 protest in Bangladesh after student is raped
articles.description: More than 1,000 students and activists have linked their hands, chanted slogans and marched through Bangladesh's main public university after a second-year student was raped
articles.content:
DHAKA, Bangladesh -- 
More than 1,000 students and activists on Monday linked their hands, chanted slogans and marched through Bangladesh's main public university after a second-year student was raped, police said.
The protesters gathered on the campus in D… [+974 chars]
